name: no.17 by Hatice Merve Güç (@bergsonist_vocation)
description: These art works are the semiotic way of the artist's principle of approaching philosophical problems such as time-space and memory. Works are designed dynamically, irregularly and consciously flawed. She incarnates her ideas with new media art by getting support from the discipline of Bergson philosophy. She gives a digital surface to her philosophical problems, adds texture, tries to capture pure time with motion. (part of Umanesimo Artificiale collection)
